chatconfig.label: Global Configuration
chatconfig.comment: Sign Up to Zopim to get a key

username.label: Email Address
username.comment: Default account email address. Use the button "Sign Up or Login to Zopim" above to fill email and key account fields to facilitate your life.

key.label: Key of your account
key.comment: Use the button "Sign Up or Login to Zopim" above to fill email and key account fields to facilitate your life. Otherwise, you can find when you get the widget code to copy and paste. it's just after the "?" in ...//zopim.com/?... e.g. tQSvi0h1kK832654Mw82weFVthsbMRtBHr

debug.label: Debug
debug.comment: Display in the footer some links to test how react the chat.

widgetconfig.label: Widget Configuration
widgetconfig.comment: • IMPORTANT: Depending on your Zopim plan, not all features will be functional like widget customization (e.g. color). Check the plan you have in the menu Zopim Live Chat > Account Setup or directly on Zopim website.

type_config.label: Type of configuration
type_config.comment: Use "simple" and go to dashboard.zopim.com to configure the widget. Use "Advanced" to configure the widget per store view or have control directly from this configuration page. In this last case, the configuration will override some configuration values of the dashboard.zopim.com.

disable_sound.label: Disable sound notifications
disable_sound.comment: Configure whether sound notifications are played.

window_title.label: Top Title
window_title.comment: Set the title on the top of the chat window.

theme_primary_color.label: Primary Color
theme_primary_color.comment: Set the primary color. Color in hexadecimal format (‘AABBCC’)

window_size.label: Size
window_size.comment: Set the size of the chat window. Allowed values: small, medium, large. ATTENTION: may not work correctly until Zopim fix his API.

button_position.label: Position
button_position.comment: ATTENTION: may not work correctly until Zopim fix his API.

button_position_mobile.label: Position on mobile devices
button_position_mobile.comment: Set the position on mobile devices.

badge_show.label: Show Badge
badge_show.comment: Show or hide the badge when the widget is loaded.

badge_layout.label: Layout
badge_layout.comment: Image right (Image on right, text on left), Image left (Image on left, text on right), Image only, Text only

badge_image.label: Image
badge_image.comment: Recommended dimensions 240x164px. No effect if the badge layout is text only

badge_text.label: Text
badge_text.comment: No effect if the layout of the badge is Image Only

concierge_name.label: Display Title
concierge_name.comment: Customize this name to give the concierge a personality.

concierge_title.label: Byline
concierge_title.comment: Write a short message to pique your visitors' interest.

concierge_avatar.label: Avatar
concierge_avatar.comment: Recommended dimensions 50x50px. Set the concierge’s avatar. Appears in greeting and status messages. Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png

bubble_show.label: Show the Bubble
bubble_show.comment: Show: If the user hides or has hidden the chat bubble, it will remain hidden on subsequent page loads until the current session expires, or the reset API function is called.

cookielaw_comply.label: Cookie Comply
cookielaw_comply.comment: Display a notice that cookies are used the first time the visitor opens the chat window. Visitors can choose to allow or disallow cookies from the Options menu only when this function is called.

cookielaw_consent.label: Cookie Implicit Consent
cookielaw_consent.comment: Disable the live chat widget and do not store cookies until the visitor explicitly allows the use of cookies.

filter.label: Filter
filter.comment: Shows only defined departments. e.g. => marketing,support,sales - Display only the specified departments in the pre-chat form. All other departments will be hidden regardless of their status.
